carbon-nanotube-info.before-level-info: you will be looking for carbon nanotubes. the structure of this causes it to be very resistant to high temperatures and high pressures. this is essential to the cooling system- carrying boiling water to the instant cooling agent. this is essential if we want our machine to function at all.
carbon-nanotube-info.after-level-info: good job in acquiring the carbon nanotubes. remember to decontaminate your suit before entering. please report any other parts of the odyssey that you have found.
